apis.name: Project issue boards API
apis.description: If a user is not a member of a private project, a GET request on that project results in a 404 status code.

apis.name: List project issue boards
apis.description: Lists project issue boards in the given project.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

apis.name: Show a single issue board
apis.description: Get a single project issue board.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: board_id
attributes.description: The ID of a board

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the new board

apis.name: Update an issue board

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: board_id
attributes.description: The ID of a board

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The new name of the board

attributes.name: assignee_id
attributes.description: The assignee the board should be scoped to

attributes.name: milestone_id
attributes.description: The milestone the board should be scoped to

attributes.name: labels
attributes.description: Comma-separated list of label names which the board should be scoped to

attributes.name: weight
attributes.description: The weight range from 0 to 9, to which the board should be scoped to

apis.name: Reorder a list in a board
apis.description: Updates an existing issue board list. This call is used to change list position.
